id-45584.title: Cake Shop
id-45584.post-content:
The Cake Shop template is an attractive design with full page graphics and a relaxed gray background and red contrast color. It opens strong with a slideshow of cakes before opening into a product showcase via parallax effects. It’s an exceptional template!

The design includes a mix of colored and image backgrounds to create a feeling of kitchen or bakery overlaid by images and content areas to showcase cakes and tell your story.

Key features of the Cake Shop template

  • Exceptional design with some lovely touches
  • Full page layout with a mixture of backgrounds
  • Parallax effect is particularly useful
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-45584.post-excerpt: Exceptional web design for cakes, bakeries and confectionery businesses

id-22058.title: Travel Agency
id-22058.post-content:
The Travel Agency template is a bright and breezy design ideal for the travel niche. The homepage has an instantly engaging header with travel-related sections before opening into a light page with tropical colors and lots of content areas to promote your travel business.

The template uses a mixture of fonts and images to create atmosphere while also keeping things light with whitespace. It’s a lovely blend of strong design and relaxation that makes pages a pleasure to browse, ideal for an industry like travel.

Key features of the Travel Agency template

  • Bright and breezy design for travel websites
  • Strong header makes an instant impact
  • Color and font choices elevate the overall design
  • Extra pages are equally well-designed
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-22058.post-excerpt: Bright, engaging website template with travel and travel businesses at its heart

id-47181.title: Consultants Firm
id-47181.post-content:
The Consultants Firm template manages to be both serious and engaging at the same time. A combination of bold colors, smart graphics, hover effects and modern fonts creates a professional feel that’s still accessible, ideal for any business.

The template includes a bold header with strong colors before opening out into a lighter page. Subtle effects, nice graphics, a mix of dark and light backgrounds and composed design creates a professional feel without being too overbearing.

Key features of the Consultants Firm template

  • Modern design ideal for any type of consultant or business website
  • Bold colors and features make an impact
  • Subtle effects throughout the homepage adds a touch of class
  • Relevant additional pages already created
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-47181.post-excerpt: Modern website template for consultant firms and any type of consulting business

id-46967.title: Cafe
id-46967.post-content:
The Café template has a combination of contemporary and heritage feel we associate with coffee shops and cafes. It’s bright and breezy, with a shaded image in the header and lots of whitespace and content areas on all pages.

The template includes some well-designed graphics, a smart parallax effect on the homepage and flexible content areas to tell your story and showcase your products and services. There’s everything a café or coffee shop needs to get online right here.

Key features of the Café template

  • Combination contemporary and heritage design
  • Reflects the look and feel of a café or coffee shop
  • Neat parallax effect on the homepage
  • Relevant extra pages already built
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-46967.post-excerpt: Refined café and coffee shop web template to promote your food business

id-55408.title: School
id-55408.post-content:
The School template provides everything you need to build an engaging website for schools, colleges, universities and all kinds of learning institutions. It’s a modern light design with a full screen header on the homepage and content areas throughout.

The pages include lots of content areas that can include images, graphics, audio and video and help portray your school in the best light. The extra pages reflect the core design and provide the information parents and future students need to engage.

Key features of the School template

  • Template designed specifically for learning
  • Lots of flexible content areas on every page
  • Calm white and blue colors provide reassurance
  • Relevant extra pages for schools and colleges
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-55408.post-excerpt: Welcoming web template ideal for schools, colleges, universities and learning

id-57385.title: Gift Shop
id-57385.post-content:
The Gift Shop template is a light, bright and welcoming website template ideal for gift shops, sweet shops, confectioners and anyone who wants to portray a vibrant personality. The design is colorful, engaging and provides lots of opportunities to promote your products.

The Gift Shop template includes impactful headers and calls to action, lots of space to showcase product categories and individual products and highlight special offers. It integrates seamlessly with WooCommerce too, so building your store is a breeze!

Key features of the Gift Shop template

  • Colorful website template for online stores
  • Lots of areas for products and special offers
  • Lots of whitespace as relief from the color
  • Product and category pages included
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-57385.post-excerpt: Colorful web template ideal for selling fun items, online stores and more

id-46704.title: e-Book Author
id-46704.post-content:
The eBook Author template is a calm, composed website template with a large area above the fold to promote your latest book. There are more opportunities promote your work further down the page as well as individual pages for books and any other publications.

The template has been well-designed and keeps things light and accessible, with a professional air. There is a lot of whitespace with plenty of content areas for you to tell your story and share your work. It’s an excellent template for promotion.

Key features of the eBook Author template

  • Well-designed template for publishers and authors
  • Nice layout with whitespace and content areas
  • Attractive header for your latest book
  • Extra pages and sections for other books
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-46704.post-excerpt: Well-designed web template for promoting books, authors and publishers

id-19494.title: BBQ Restaurant
id-19494.post-content:
The BBQ Restaurant template makes an instant impact with a video header overlaid with sympathetic fonts. It sets the scene immediately and is backed up by a great color scheme, mix of serif and sans serif fonts and plenty of content areas.

The entire website template has been well thought-out, with lots of space for images, a menu, graphics, descriptions and a booking form. Both the menu and contact pages are particularly good, which should help increase the number of bookings you get.

Key features of the BBQ Restaurant template

  • Striking video header sets the scene instantly
  • Lots of relevant content areas including menu and booking
  • Great mix of colors and fonts
  • Attractive extra pages relevant to the restaurant niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-19494.post-excerpt: Impactful web template for restaurants, eateries and new food businesses

id-21828.title: Health Coach
id-21828.post-content:
The Health Coach template has a fantastic design with bright colors, an illustrative header image, bright contrast color and plenty of whitespace around content areas. It’s ideal for fitness, health, wellness and associated businesses.

The homepage is instantly engaging, with clear messaging, attractive graphics and elements designed for health coaches. Everything can be tweaked for other fitness or wellness businesses using a drag and drop page builder. It’s too good a template not to use!

Key features of the Health Coach template

  • Fantastic design with engaging colors and fonts
  • Designed around the health and wellness niche
  • Lots of content areas on the homepage and supplementary pages
  • Complementing colors for calls to action and graphics
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-21828.post-excerpt: Vibrant health and wellness template that engages instantly and draws you in
